Hospitality, Restaurant & Tourism Manage.1: Apply leadership development strategies for hospitality organizations.
Hospitality, Restaurant & Tourism Manage.2: Utilize management principles of planning, organizing, evaluating and controlling in hospitality organizations:  Lodging, Events, Food & Beverage, and Tourism.
Hospitality, Restaurant & Tourism Manage.3: Demonstrate ethical behavior in decision making, leadership and management in the hospitality industry.
Hospitality, Restaurant & Tourism Manage.4: Apply legal precepts as related to hospitality Industry issues.
Hospitality, Restaurant & Tourism Manage.5: Apply human resource principles in the hospitality industry.
Hospitality, Restaurant & Tourism Manage.6: Utilize principles of financial management in budgeting, investing and capital planning.
